parameters: ...We've been going down all this time, right?

Remember the root cause for that murderous
intent you are feeling right now.
My beloved mother, my beloved sister.
We three lived so peacefully together...
It seems like nothing has changed...
That is how it feels, yes.
Because the only one who can cleanse the darkness
Does that mean it was all meaningless?
No, that is not the case at all.
The burden on your heart has been alleviated,
and the influence of darkness weakens.

It was my fault that the prison was so noisy.
...Would it be more peaceful without me?
Your expertise as a hunter is needed on this star.
There's nothing wrong with you, Muracca.
Opposite of what your words may suggest.
...Hey, what do you mean by that.
Then, we shall take our leave──
What will you do about your family, Muracca?

If left alone, it'll lead to problems again.
To provide Mana and let them live on──
I will not condemn that decision.
However, you must keep faith in that action.
The worst thing to be is to be lost.
Then I have no further words to say.
ここが最後だった場合のイベント

in Signine. Gee, it's been a while.
